biotools.summary: Method used to predict the binding ligand for a protein. The method used the 3 Dimensional Zernike Descriptor (3DZD) and Approximate Patch Position (APP) to describe the features of different patches of the protein pocket.

bioschemas.name: Patch-Surfer
bioschemas.summary: Method used to predict the binding ligand for a protein. The method used the 3 Dimensional Zernike Descriptor (3DZD) and Approximate Patch Position (APP) to describe the features of different patches of the protein pocket.
